item.title: Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd Hits New 52-Week High of Rs 3,350
item.description: Shriram Pistons & Rings Ltd has surged to a fresh 52-week high, reaching an intraday peak of Rs.3350 on 2 Jan 2026, marking a significant milestone for the auto components company amid a broadly bullish market environment. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Atal Realtech Ltd Hits New 52-Week High, Marking Significant Rally
item.description: Atal Realtech Ltd has reached a new 52-week high, reflecting a robust rally in the realty sector. The stock’s latest peak underscores its strong performance over the past year, significantly outpacing broader market indices and demonstrating sustained momentum. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: CSB Bank Ltd Hits New 52-Week High, Marking Significant Market Milestone
item.description: CSB Bank Ltd has reached a new 52-week high, closing just 0.97% shy of its peak price of ₹490.20, underscoring a robust rally in the private sector banking space. This milestone reflects sustained momentum driven by strong market performance and favourable technical indicators. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Dynemic Products Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Weak Financial Metrics
item.description: Dynemic Products Ltd, a player in the Specialty Chemicals sector, has recently touched a new 52-week low, closing near Rs 241.2, marking a significant decline in its stock price over the past year amid subdued financial performance and valuation concerns. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Surge to New Highs as Broad Market Advances on Strong Sectoral Gains
item.description: Indian equity benchmarks extended their upward momentum on 2 January 2026, with the Sensex gaining 573.41 points (0.67%) to close at 85,762.01 and the Nifty hitting a fresh 52-week high of 26,328.55, up 182 points (0.7%). Broad-based sectoral gains and robust market breadth underscored investor confidence, even as select pockets of weakness emerged in defensive segments. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: SMT Engineering Leads Market Rally with 908% Return in Six Months
item.description: In a remarkable display of market outperformance, SMT Engineering, a micro-cap stock in the Trading & Distributors sector, has delivered an extraordinary 908.42% return over the past six months, vastly eclipsing benchmark indices and peers alike. This surge underscores a potent combination of bullish technicals, outstanding financials, and sector-specific catalysts that have propelled the stock into the spotlight. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Dabur India Ltd. Hits Intraday High with 5.1% Surge on 2 Jan 2026

The stock outperformed the FMCG sector and broader market indices, reflecting strong trading momentum throughout the session. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: NHPC Ltd Hits Intraday High with Strong 5.01% Surge on 2 Jan 2026
item.description: NHPC Ltd demonstrated robust intraday strength on 2 Jan 2026, surging to a day’s high of Rs 83.86, marking a 5.21% increase. This performance outpaced the broader power sector and the Sensex, reflecting notable momentum in the stock’s trading activity. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: SMT Engineering Leads Exceptional Stock Returns in One-Year Period
item.description: In a remarkable display of market outperformance, SMT Engineering, a micro-cap stock in the Trading & Distributors sector, has delivered an extraordinary return of 2091.6% over the past year, vastly surpassing benchmark indices and peers. This surge highlights the stock’s strong fundamentals, bullish technical outlook, and investor enthusiasm despite its expensive valuation. Time: 2 hours ago
